plot: Idoli,Disciplina kicme, Elektricni orgazam, Laki pinvini, Piloti, Ekatarina Velika, all line up to show their specific music styles, in a one of a kind gathering of the best of the New Wave...
title: Rock and Revolution
plot_es: Idoli,Disciplina kicme, Elektricni orgazam, Laki pinvini, Piloti, Ekatarina Velika, all line up to show their specific music styles, in a one of a kind gathering of the best of the New Wave...
